frmRPDReports.description: Welcome to AfyaPro Report Designer Wizard
This wizard will guide you through the process of designing a report
Enter report code, description and then select a view that will act as a data source
Generated select command, you can customize this command
Define all the parameters that will be used by the report
Build the conditions using source fields and defined parameters
Is greater than or equal to
Is less than or equal to
Build the filter string using the conditions you defined.
Add group columns that will be used for aggregate functions if any
Below is the full SQL statement generated by the wizard, Click Next to Design the reporting form and test the statement
You have successfully completed the report creation wizard
To close this wizard, click Finish

frmCUSCustomerGroups.description: Prompt for Payment when posting bills

frmTOOImportation.description: Welcome to AfyaPro Data Importation Wizard
This wizard will guide you through the process of importing data from a different source
From where do you want to import data
Select source and destination tables for importation
Map the fields from the source table to the destination table
The wizard has collected enough information for importation. Client Next to start importing data
You have successfully completed the data importation wizard
To close this wizard, click Finish
Auto generate code when doing importation
